title: Scoop: Google could be bringing Air Raid Alerts to almost all Android phones
content:
The current invasion of Ukraine has seen several big tech companies step up and apply varying degrees of pressure on Russia. We’ve seen Apple entirely stop selling its products in the region, we’ve seen Meta and TikTok prevent access to state-news broadcasters RT and Sputnik, and we’ve even seen Google go so far as to

The post Scoop: Google could be bringing Air Raid Alerts to almost all Android phones appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google could be integrating Air Raid Alerts into Google Play Services, according to an APK Teardown. Check out what that means, here.
